column1: The High Pass was a pass over the Misty Mountains. On its western end was the refuge of Rivendell
column5: p. 207 and from there the East Road climbed into the mountains until it reached the mountain under which lied the Goblin-town.

column1: There were actually two passes at this location. The lower pass was more prone to being blocked by Orcs
column2: hence most travellers used the higher pass outside of those rare occasions when the Orcs were suppressed.

column1: ==History==
The High Pass was first created during the First Age by Oromë the Valar
column2: in order to allow for a crossing of the mountains by the Eldar.

column1: Later the High Pass was used by the Dwarves
column2: who connected their roads (the Great East Road and the Men-i-Naugrim through Mirkwood) with it.

column1: In the Second Age the High Pass was used by the army of Gil-galad and Elendil when they marched to Mordor in the War of the Last Alliance of Elves and Men. After this war Isildur was slain by Orcs watching the way towards the pass.
The Pass became dangerous again because of the Orcs. Only with the War of the Dwarves and Orcs
column2: which nearly wiped out all Orcs of the mountains
column3: did it became safe again. Nevertheless in
column4: the goblins of Goblin-town had burrowed their way back to it
column5: and Bilbo Baggins and the Dwarves of Thorin were captured the next year during the Quest of Erebor.

column1: During the War of the Ring
column2: Grimbeorn and the Beornings kept the High Pass open
column3: but the Fellowship of the Ring bypassed the High Pass because the eastern side of the Misty Mountains had become too dangerous.

column1: ==Names==
The High Pass was also known as the Pass of Imladris. In Sindarin
column2: the pass was called Cirith Forn en Andrath ("the high-climbing pass of the north"); cirith + forn (Sindarin) + andrath (word)).

column1: ==Other Versions of the Legendarium==
In the draft for the chapter
column3: Elrond gave a name for both the High Pass and the Front Porch

column1: == Portrayals in Adaptations ==
2007: The Lord of the Rings Online:
:The High Pass can be found in the region of the Misty Mountains and is divided into two areas: the Northern High Pass and the Southern High Pass.
2012: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey:
:The Dwarves take the High Pass
column2: except without Gandalf. They end up in the middle of a fight between Stone-giants.
